snippet.title: EA SPORTS FC 25 | Official Gameplay Deep Dive
snippet.description:
See the new gameplay features coming to EA SPORTS FC 25 including FC IQ, Player Roles, Goalkeeper PlayStyles, and more. Pre-order FC 25 now: http://x.ea.com/80849

Get your team playing like the world’s best with FC IQ, influence player tactics through all-new Player Roles, along with all new goalkeeper PlayStyles and more new gameplay features in FC25. Learn more about the new gameplay features in EA SPORTS FC 25, launching September 27: http://x.ea.com/80850

Pre-order EA SPORTS FC 25 Ultimate Edition by 20 August to get an untradeable Football Ultimate Team™ Hero Item in EA SPORTS FC™ 25 with an upgraded 'Prime' version arriving in November and receive an untradeable Hero or ICON Player Item in FC 24 Ultimate Team™ from the Greats of the Game campaign: http://x.ea.com/80849

CHAPTERS:
0:00 - Intro
0:19 - FC IQ
1:30 - Player Roles
2:18 - Smart Tactics
3:46 - Goalkeeper PlayStyles

Subscribe to see more from EA SPORTS FC™: http://bit.ly/pzw4VD

#FC25
